Translations.Text: Baluna, ‘yadi allah‌ra kache akheratera basasthana an'ya loka chara bisesabhabe sudhu tomadera jan'ya'i haya, tabe tomara mrtyu kamana kara---yadi satyabadi haye thaka’
Kintu tadera krtakarmera karane tara kakhano ta kamana karabe na. Ara allah‌ yalimadera sambandhe samyaka jnani

Ara apani abasya'i taderake jibanera prati an'yasaba lokera ceye besi lobhi dekhate pabena, emanaki musarikadera ca'ite'o. Tadera pratyeke asa kare yadi hajara bachara ayu deya hata; athaca dirghayu take sasti hate niskrti dite parabe na. Tara ya kare allah‌ tara samyaka drasta

Baluna, ‘ye ke'u jibarilera [1] satru habe, ejan'ye ye, tini allah‌ra anumatikrame apanara hrdaye kura'ana nayila karechena, ya purbabarti kitabera'o satyayanakari ebam ya muminadera jan'ya pathapradarsaka o subha sambada’
‘Ye ke'u allah‌, tamra pheresatagana, tamra rasulagana ebam jib‌rila o mika'ilera satru habe, tabe niscaya allah‌ kaphiradera satru’
Ara abasya'i amara apanara prati suspasta ayatasamuha nayila karechi. Phasikara chara an'ya ke'u ta asbikara kare na
Eta ki naya ye, tara yakhana'i kono angikara kareche takhana'i tadera kono eka dala ta chumre pheleche? Baram tadera adhikansa'i imana ane na

Ara yakhana allah‌ra paksa theke tadera nikata ekajana rasula asalena, tadera kache ya rayeche tara satyayanakari hisebe, takhana yaderake kitaba deya hayechilo tadera ekadala allah‌ra kitabake pichane chumre phelalo, yena tara jane'i na
